name: Avon Products
goal:
Avon's Brussels office shall represent and promote the interests of the company at European and corporate level.

This mission will be achieved, in particular:

o Monitoring any legislative development that presents an interest for the business;

o Maintaining contacts with relevant officials and with other relevant business organisations and consumer interest groups in Brussels;

o Determining and advocating new EU legislation in the interests of the efficient operation of pan European business;

o Disseminating to its local teams, legislative and other information of use in the efficient operation of its business.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Internal Market - Trade - Environment - Cosmetics - Digital Single Market - Privacy
